abstract: An article last Sunday about the growth of the online game company Zynga misstated its predicted revenue. According to the Inside Network, which tracks Facebook apps, Zynga is expected to take in as much as $500 million this year, not $835 million.
lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about the growth of the online game company Zynga misstated its predicted revenue. According to the Inside Network, which tracks Facebook apps, Zynga is expected to take in as much as $500 million this year, not $835 million.
